content: you know sometimes my poor wife feels
like a crafting Widow so I'll bring my stuff down and set I have my dining-room
table here set up stuff and you know it can be as simple as just a gooseneck
lamp which is very cheap and just a mat of cardboard that you can use to cover
your table I have a tablecloth on the table also so that helps but yeah that's
just that simple so I just so she doesn't feel like a crafting Widow I'll
bring some stuff up and you know watch TV and stuff with her while I'm crafting
why not you know that's a great way to binge watch and that kind of thing
so let's check out a couple things I was working on I'm working on my hoard of
the Dragon Queen and there's the ice people the ice hunters and I did a lot
of 3d printing for this and I'm really happy with it
here's something I had for the dragon's lair I got off a thing verse here's some
of the ice toads I did so really cool and those are 3d printed here's a Yeti a
free Yeti I got online so Wow look at that not bad for a 3d printed miniature
these little rocks here are from ice rocks are from one of those just cheap
plastic sets with minis in it here's my ice hunters and you can see I've got you
know a good nice selection here and all these are off thing verse now the
Huskies here are just wolves I painted like husky so I think those came out
really neat I did a couple other cool things here's some huts I'm working on
and here's some little boats or kayak type woman not really kayaks but you
know canoe type boats may have a hide and bone that I thought it'd be really
fun for the adventure so there we go there's so my stuff that I'm working on
with my 3d printer and you know doing for the hoard of the Dragon Queen and
yeah don't let your wife be a craft Widow you know set up upstairs and you
guys can watch TV together and you know you can still converse and you know not
be I have a dungeon lair and not be trapped in your dungeon lair so there we
go I hope you enjoyed the little peek here and don't make your wife a crafting
Widow hey friends if you're not subscribed
subscribe if you haven't seen my other videos check it out I have hundreds of
other videos from crafting to DMing also consider my patreon I have extra content
there for my wonderful supporters and you guys like go forth and craft and
have great games
